name: Loo
review: I have very sensitive, Asian skin. But it works well.. Makes my uneven skin tone good, covers up acne scars. It smells like sunscreen but it quickly went away.. Kind of shiny so I set with powder.. Overall it's a great product

name: rachel hardy
review: I use this product everyday. I love it and it lasts all day.

name: Yanni
review:
The skin look good in the picture <3
I luv it

name: ninaeaster
review: This is my favorite bb cream I have used so far. It covers pretty well. This is a good option for combo skin since it mattifies without drying out your skin

name: TKB
review: This is the best BB Cream I have tried. I have very sensative skin, and I have had no issues at all. It is 30SPF Which makes it wonderful for everyday use. I use it alone for daytime and under my make-up at night.

name: Jojo
review: I have normal-to-dry skin and while I like the color and coverage this product provides, the texture is a little too drying for my skin. First, it sets really quickly, so it becomes tacky once you start rubbing it in. Second, once it does become a little drier, it starts "pilling" on me, if that makes sense. As I keep rubbing to blend it in, little flakes of the product start forming, kind of like when you rub glue between your hands. Also, the smell is a little off-putting. Overall I probably would recommend this for people who don't have as dry skin, but the coverage is great for everyday use when you don't have anything too heavy.

name: acm
review: Use as tinted moisturizer

name: College girl
review: I began using this product as an everyday foundation, while it is all the pro's listed above, I didn't think it made my skin look as spectacular as advertised.

name: Kailey
review: This is my first Revlon PhotoReady product, and I prefer BB Creams over any other kind of face makeup just because I am only 14 and don't need much coverage because I have normal skin. But, for what I paid for this product, it wasnt worth the hype. I mean, it's good and I use it, and I will use it much more during the summer, but for purposes such as school and sports, it's not useful. Im switching back to my Loreal BB Cream until summer roles around. Again, not a bad product at all, but I expected way better than what I got.

name: Kailey
review: This is my first Revlon PhotoReady product, and I prefer BB Creams over any other kind of face makeup just because I am only 14 and don't need much coverage because I have normal skin. But, for what I paid for this product, it wasnt worth the hype. I mean, it's good and I use it, and I will use it much more during the summer, but for purposes such as school and sports, it's not useful. Im switching back to my Loreal BB Cream until summer roles around. Again, not a bad product at all, but I expected way better than what I got.

name: Jules
review: From what I have heard, this BB cream is not good for ALL skin conditions (especially naturally oily skin). For my incredibly dry skin, however, this product is perfect! It causes breakouts occasionally, but I already get acne regularly, so that's really not a huge deal to me. The coverage could be better, but for a basic, everyday BB cream, Revlon PhotoReady does a fantastic job! Other BB creams I have tried have looked fine in person, but made my skin look awful and weird on camera. If you are planning on having pictures taken of yourself, this is the BB cream to wear. It also blends super well and even though it only comes in a few shades, the lightest shade fits my SUPER light skin very well, which is often hard for me to find in BB creams.

name: Grace
review: This was absolutely terrible for my oily skin and made me look so greasy! Also it smells strongly like sunblock which really bothers me. It also oxidizes throughout the day and felt greasy and sticky.

name: Mary
review: Bought it because sales lady recommend it.  Worst purchase made.  Not happy since it did not perform like the sales person said it would

name: Diane
review: Good coverage for what I needed

name: Natalie
review: Don't waste your money on this. I tried it after I bought it and it was decent, but within the first week after I bought this, the product separated into a disgusting, chunky, oily mess. I never left it in a hot car, it was stored in my (air conditioned) bathroom. I only got to use it once before it curdled. The one time I did get to use it it was okay but not great for the price.

name: Jess
review: I have dry skin and it definitely moisturized my skin but left it a little too oily

name: A
review: I have very uneven skin tones, wanted to use as a base to cover.  It was greasy & hard to use my full coverage makeup over it, which seemed to slide off my face.

name: Shar
review: I bought this after hearing a lot of people rave about how great it was (long lasting great coverage yet lightweight and natural feeling). However it seemed to miss the mark, especially for its high price for a drugstore brand. The color was not light enough and the formula left it feeling a little bit greasy on the skin. It's definitely a shame since I am willing to spend the money on good products, which Revlon seems to have, but not this one.

name: kris
review: I live in nj and in the summer it gets crazy hot, this bb cream makes gives me the perfect amount of coverage without looking greasy or oily!! I love this so much, would definitely recommend!

name: Lynn the runner
review: It went on very smoothly, good coverage.

name: Irene
review: In the fall/winter my skin becomes a tad dryer but oily as the day goes on. This immediately feels greasy on my face. I did try setting it with powder and it did not work. It makes my skin look worse than before I put it on. My make up within a couple of hours came completely off and looked absolutely horrible.

name: that girl
review: this is my first bb cream so i'm no expert on this kind of makeup. i use revlon whipped foundation and was looking for something for everyday use and not as "heavy". my first try was not that great. it's very greasy and smells strong, both because of the spf. it's not a very good coverage, but that is expected because it's not a foundation. but i do continue to use this product because i've found that a little bit of concealer and powder seems to help a lot. i use powder even with the whipped foundation, so powder is a must for me. after this process, it gives me a more natural/minimal makeup look, and that's exactly what i wanted. overall, don't like the greasy feeling or smell, but i've learned how to control that in order to like it.

name: ME
review: Evens out skin tones.

name: Nope
review: This makes you look greasy. Also, doesn't even do the basic as to even your skin tone. It just makes you look super oily even if you do powder it, and it also caused breakouts.

name: Ingrid
review: Not happy. Streaky after just two hours of wearing.. Doesn't blend that great.  Creased big time in the lines under my eyes. Super transferable. Haven't tried setting it with any powder but since the color tone is kinda orangy, i won't bother. Sorry to say it's going back.

name: Emily Francis
review: It's a really great foundation if you don't need something too heavy. There's a bit of smell from it, but it's nothing too strong.

name: NikkiA
review: Didn't use this product long enough.   Color was too light.

name: acm
review: Easy to apply.  very nice consistency

name: Mairi the dancer
review: I have been pleased with other Revlon Photo Ready products, so this was my first BB cream. Inadequate, streaky coverage, ineffective moisturizing.

name: sherry
review: I put it on before i ride my bike.  After 16 miles my makeup look as great as the 1st mile.

name: Pbrowb
review: Too oily

name: Marie
review: I love how good the coverage is and its very natrual looking. Although it's a nightmare getting on. It always looks streaky and is hard to blend. I would recommend this for a 1-4 hours in room temperature. If you're gonna be in the heat it sweats off FAST. The only reason I gave it stars is it gives good coverage and moisture.

name: Mel
review: Not worth it, unless you want your eyes to burn and be watery all day.

name: Sam L.
review:
It's greasy, heavy, oxidizes as soon as you squeeze it from the tube, blending is a nightmare, it breaks down your makeup, and no matter how much you set it with powder and spray it melts off an hour later.
I have extremely dry pale skin and this product makes my skin look yellow, streaky, and oily.

name: Coolocean
review: Just trying something new

name: Pauline
review: I put some on the top of my hand,and apply liberally. Goes on smooth and creamy.

name: Megan the cashier
review: This product is more like sunscreen with the faitest hint of color is applies clumpy and thick, makes me breakout and feels oily on the skin. It only last about 2-3 hours of the skin before it fades and breaks apart your makeup.

name: Shannon
review: Product is easy to apply, lightweight coverage as to be expected with a BB Cream. My main complaint is that it was extremely oily (I have combination skin). Once applied, I looked like I had wiped oil all over my face.

name: CAO
review: I've tried several different types of tinted moisturizers with SPF and this is my favorite. I have sensitive, somwhat dry skin and this blends well and feels great. The fair color is perfect for fair skin but not too pale.

name: Tj
review: Light coverage every day

name: nat
review:
okay for starters
-i have normal-dry skin
-light medium color
-a few pimples here and there
-a lot of redness, dark circles, scars

i want a foundation that is natural looking, and with a dewey finish for every day wear. i like this product, but i also dont :/
with about two coats i get the coverage i want, adding some concealer. it feels very light, looks very natural and beautiful! the only and major problem is, is that it doesnt stay on all day. i specifically wanted this to wear for school and an every day look. i have tried this product for about a week using different tricks, and it wont even last me 3 hours in school! but, when im just at my office or not performing much movement it will stay on a bit longer!
so if your not a person of a lot of activity and arent walking a lot all day, this can work for you and stay on!
personally for me, its not going to work :/
i love the product, but i dont want to waste it with touch ups every 3 hours!

name: Big Donna
review: I really don't like the consistensy of this product.

name: One2Punch
review: I think this is comparable to Smashbox BB. A little bit goes a long way. I bought medium & it seems Really dark, but that's the darkest color they have. So be careful when selecting a shade.

name: furrydog55720
review: I didn't care for this product and plan on exchanging it for the Loreal BB cream.

name: Marketing nerd
review: It made my face so incredibly greasy. I couldn't believe it. I felt like I rubbed my face with petroleum jelly.

name: blugurl
review: Great product for those who want quick no fuss application resulting in a clean, smooth complexion.

name: Melanie
review: Best bb cream I love mixing it with my maybelline to create the perfect color! Feels light but gives great coverage!

name: Gigi
review: This best described as a tinted moisturizer or better yet a tinted sunscreen... Literally because it has that sunscreen feel and smell. I have normal to dry skin. Now that its winter my skin is dryer than ever so that's why I gave it 3 stars because I don't  necessarily like it but I don't hate it either. From the bottom of heart I do not suggest someone to use who has oily combination skin because it would look like you put oil on your Face. Me like I said I have dry skin and it makes me look shiny. It feels like I put two layers of moisturizer on. Th coverage is very sheer, doesn't cover redness or acne. When i applied this to my face it made me shiny and it kinda made my face look like I have a fake tan . I dont know if that made sense but I choose the color medium because that what my shade usually is and it actually made me look darker . Idk bottom line Is I like the SPF and moisterizing effect because its soooo cold but i guess theres soooo much spf and the effects of it there's not much to like about it.

name: Red Sister
review: My forehead was greasy by lunch time. Wished there was more coverage.

name: faithfullmia
review: My comments may be unfair to the product because my skin reacted to it and the result was terrible texture and appearance.  The product  may work perfectly well for non-sensitive skins.

name: CakeBunnie
review: Even though it's a BB cream, it covers like a foundation for me. I do put this over my Anastasia concealer and it does so well with coverage. I blend it out with my Miracle Sponge and it just goes on pretty well. I admit that at first squeeze, it looks disappointing, but it turned out to be one of my favorite BB creams. I'm wearing it right now and it's still holding up nicely. It leaves me smooth and hydrated. I really love this BB cream for days where I just wanna go natural.

name: allagator
review: Purchased this product as a light spring/summer alternative to my foundation. Unfortunately, this is a bad product. It did not blend at all. I made several attempts to use it sparingly, use it liberally, mix it in with my moisturizer, etc., the results were always the same: it sits on the skin in watches, like nude cottage cheese. You really have to rub it in to blend it. My skin tone is medium/olive, but even the light/medium color came in a hue that was too orange. Very disappointed.

name: Katie
review: I hate the way this product applies. I always use my fingers to apply a BB cream and I did the same with this product, when I applied it however it takes forever to actually buff into the skin and even when you do rub it all in i find it looks quite cake and is much too heavy and greasy

name: Miriam
review: I use this product daily to class and find that it gives me an oily glow that results in sweating and smearing throughout the day.

name: Trixie
review: I like that this foundation is lightweight and goes on really smooth. I like the that it has sunscreen built in so I don't have to worry about that. I wish it came in more variety of colors/pigments and that the coverage was better (it's a little thin).

name: Sandy
review: This is an amazing product. It looks super natural and it evens out my skin without looking like I have any makeup on. People think I have naturally flawless skin. Grab this stuff up now! Great price and it works perfectly. Don't forget to put some on your jawline and neck too.

name: old girls love make up to
review: Love this product I'm 42 and I have the skin of a 30yr old I use this  everyday my skin has actually improved in texture and clairity since using this product. I set my BB cream with the photo ready powder from Revlon. I actually own an air brush system which I love, but its to  exspensive to use everyday. I receive almost identical results from the bb cream combo from Revlon

name: Barbara
review: I bought this hoping to find a cheaper alternative to my Tarte tinted moisturizer. Unfortunately, this is not it. I liked the way this applied & the coverage was decent but about an hour after I applied this my eyes started burning & watering & another hour later my nose was running. I gave the product a few more hours before I eventually couldn't stand it & had to wash my face. I returned this immediately. Back to Tarte!

name: Marcella
review: Don't waste your money.

name: Sassymom
review: Goes on smooth gives a flawless finish.

name: LizzyM2017
review: I found the product to be too heavy and oily for my skin. I also didn't like the subtle smell of the SPF. I'll be looking for a different BB cream

name: Psych RN
review: Use on a daily basis for light to moderate coverage.

name: Lovebyrhi
review: Very disappointed it's awful it doesn't even stay on it doesn't have any coverage it made my face look really greasy.

name: Julies
review: No coverage and very oily. Disappointed

name: Rach
review: Nnnnn

name: Dr
review: I was instantly turned off by the amount of shine this product created, just upon application! It didn't go away, either, like some sunscreen products can do. I tried Maybelline 8-in-1 BB the day before and was much happier with that one.

name: Jess
review: I got the shade light medium, but it's too ashy for me. Product balls up if applied with hands and separates easily. It works okay when mixed with other products but I won't be repurchasing.

name: MrsLetty
review: affordable

name: Dianix
review: Poor coverage, don't last for long on my face

name: New Angel
review: Goes on smooth. I like that it has SPF in it.

name: Lucious Liz
review: Doesn't come on light and made my face look sunburned with the light/medium

name: Kelly
review: goes on slightly shiny but this is solved by using primer underneath

name: lala
review: needed good skin coverage for a photo shoot have some age spots, m ade me look fresh and younger  without that heavy painted on look, love it

name: G.
review: I've tried IT Cosmetics CC cream because of how raved it is. I tried illuminating one and normal formula. I wasn't wowed by either. It left me feeling swallowed up by a heavy sunscreen. So I tried out this Revlon BB and the Nyx BB. I really loved this product more than I expected. My skin is fair, patchy, dry. I have large pores, hyperpigmentation, black heads on nose and chin area. This is very sheer, but somehow it made me look "put together." It has a nice glow to it. I would suggest only those with dry skin try this out. Also those with dry skin check out the NYX BB. Overall, I really like the Revlon BB and will continue using it until I see any cons or downsides. It's great for something light and easy to apply. (I used my fingers to apply it and I am NOT someone who likes to apply makeup with my fingers)

name: greenfig28
review: OK so the look I was going for was a tinted moisturizer I could wear when I'm laying at the pool or walking around Disney World when a full face of makeup isn't practical. My body is tan and you don't want to walk around with a pale face that doesn't match. Anyways this product is perfect! I love the Revlon foundation and so I thought I would try this. Plus it was cheaper than the Bareminerals complexion rescue that I also had my eye on.

name: ABQ505
review:
Not a fan.
This did nothing for my skin at all. Barely there coverage. It was streaky with a brush, not good with a beauty blender, with fingers it was best but not buildable enough and did not look right. I like that the medium was not light or too dark but something just seemed off. I looked sickly when ever I used this. Maybe it is too olive toned???
It wore off pretty quick also and accentuated pores.
The only thing I liked about it was the texture on my skin. It was not too heavy or greasy. Once set with powder it felt nice and I did not get oily!! Woohoo BUT I looked a mess lol.
I looked sick, Looked like I had no coverage for the marks on my skin which are light by the way. I am not sure if it made me look kinda green or gray, but I looked sick. Just terrible.

name: bebe
review: It is very light pigmented

name: Lex
review: I would love to use this product bc of its great coverage but it causes my face to break out immediately

name: steph
review: Very good product in love with it just make sure you use a moisturizer before applying

name: Ulta Lover
review: I've been wanting a BB cream with SPF since I live in Florida and you can't avoid the sun. I used it as a primer and then added my foundation, bronzer, and finishing powder and it's been great. It's not greasy and doesn't make my skin look oily, which is important. I originally bought it since it was BOGO 50% off and I'll definitely be buying this again when I run out. Makes me glad I decided on this BB Cream.

name: sEdegecomb
review: I was so excited to try this after hearing great reviews... But sadly it was the worst BB CREAM I've tried yet. I would never give me that matte finish I wanted. Even after applying, I would set it with a powder and find that all day I looked shiny! Yuck! I still go back to my maybeline BB CREAM

name: Linda
review: Goes on very smoothly, no streaking, and relatively inexpensive.

name: Murphy
review: Need a larger size.

name: DG
review: Is sheer but still enough coverage

name: Jewellie
review: I love the coverage.

name: suzanne
review: i like the spf 30 in the product no need to apply more sunscreen for everyday use

name: fullmoonsail
review: Taking on vacation.  This BB cream has a higher SPF than most.  Covers but does not look heavy.

name: Sunshine
review: I was hoping to cover up brown spots a bit better

name: Mandy
review:
This is the first BB cream I've bought, and I was excited and curious. This one wasn't too expensive, so I thought I'd give it a try.

It wasn't especially moisturizing, so I can't really skip my regular moisturizer, which I was hoping to do. It spreads more like a liquid foundation, not like a moisturizer.

The coverage isn't anything to write home about, either. I usually skip foundation entirely, so I wasn't too upset about that, but it doesn't seem to be smoothing my tone or anything.

The biggest 'pro' is that it hasn't made my skin break out like normal liquid foundations do. It's very lightweight, which is a plus. And I like having something with SPF.

Overall, though, I don't see this one as being the 'miracle cream' BBs seem to want to be.

name: Kronos 1
review: This gives a nice coverage,evens out has a high SPF good value

name: tinabobeena
review: This product was a big disappointment. Not only did it not really blend well and, despite the tint, have much coverage at all, it also left a yellow cast to my skin AND worst of all causes my eyes to burn and water. In addition, it didn't wear well. After just a couple of hours, I looked a hot mess between my red, watery eyes and just general splotchy, oiliness everywhere else. I'd recommend trying the Garnier or L'oreal BB cream instead.

name: Linselle
review: I got this as a cheaper alternative to my smashbox bb cream.  For the price, this bb cream is very good, however my one complaint is that it was quite a bit more greasy than other bb creams.  As a young teenager w/ acne-prone skin, this wasn't for me, but I would recomend it to dry or more mature skin type.

name: StellaD
review: Feels heavy and a little oily on my combo skin. Not for me.

name: Jessica
review: This product is great. I like the coverage - it covers redness on my cheeks but doesn't look or feel heavy on the face like liquid foundation does, you can't even tell I'm wearing anything. It is a very creamy formula and blends out well - I just use my fingers and it goes smoothly over my skin. If you're looking for a natural look and feel from face makeup, I recommend this!

name: Shay
review:
I have been using Dr. Jarts BB cream for a couple of years now and have been happy enough, but it only comes in one shade and it is better for a winter-pale fair skin than it is for spring and summer warmer toned (but still fairly pale) skin. So I am seeking a BB cream for the warmer months and decided to pick this up.

People expecting BB creams to have the coverage of foundations will always be disappointed. But I do feel this is lighter coverage even than other BB creams I have enjoyed. That said, the light coverage on this product does help even out skin tone for me, enough for a casual knock-around day where I don't want full makeup. Using it as a base underneath light liquid or mineral makeups works really well.

I did not experience the greasiness others complain about, but I wonder if they use BB creams with SPF in them normally? Because anything with SPF will be a little bit "stickier" than ones without. Also expired product, product kept in hotter conditions, etc will tend to separate and the oils will be more prominent in that case.

I want to reserve full judgement until I have word this for more than a few days, to see how my skin fares. But for now, enjoying this drug store find!

name: Aussie
review: I bought this because I heard that they had such good coverage and it was a perfect BB cream. So I went out and purchased it. As I applied this product it did not go on my face as I thought it would. it felt greasy, oily, and it did not cover anything. NO more how much I tried to build up the coverage. Nothing... After awhile I thought I'd give it a try again. And still the same! it was gross and it still felt super heavy, greasy, oily! just ew! I really regret buying this product.

name: Stubby
review: I usually use a different brand of BB cream but I got this to try it out. It is a lot heavier (ad greasier) than BB creams I've used before. The first time I used it I noticed some break outs and stopped using it. Went back to my old stuff. I decided to give this another try and oh boy do I regret it. I have never really had a problem with acne but this stuff gave me the worst of my life. Painful acne all over my cheeks and chin. This stuff .is definitely only for special occasions- weddings or picture day.

name: Dallas beauty
review: This started out good. It was a great match to my skin tone, but after using for a few weeks, what came out of the tube was a watery, greasy mess. Literally liquid would come out that was separate from the cream. It's gross. I will not be buying again.

name: Jennifer the BBW
review: I am fair skinned, so I bought the Fair shade. This cream really made me look pale and greasy. I do not have oily skin to begin with. I have normal to dry skin. My face just felt so slimy. I also felt like my skin couldn't breathe through it. It seemed to be sliding off of my skin and I ended up with some in the corners of my eyes. I tried to wipe the cream out carefully, but some must have gotten into my eyes. They wouldn't stop watering and burning. I went home and washed it all off and applied another brand, which I am having no issues with.

name: debi
review: It's light not greasy and gives a natural look

name: Psm320
review: Recommended to me by my daughter. Great coverage but feels light to wear. Love it!

name: Pam
review: I used it all summer long for a natural look with good SPF protection.

name: Onagain
review: This products separates (oil from the color) after about three weeks). What you end up with is a bunch of grease that comes out of the tube that is followed by some colored cream. Tried shaking the tube but did nothing to blend the two. I bought one and got one half off and they both did the same thing. Will not buy this product again.

name: the redhead
review: I wanted to love this but I can't. I got it so I could be outside doing active things and have coverage and sun protection. It really doesn't cover many imperfections as it is so sheer and it looks very shiny, greasy on your face. I have dry skin and even I looked like I had oily skin. It did keep me from burning, but I'm not going to buy it again.

name: Jinx
review:
This is my first use. I'm a senior who has never experienced breakouts. I'm thinking my application, may be incorrect and not often enough to give the product a chance.
The thought of BB Cream lightening and giving my skin a healthy appearance is appealing.
It's been many years since I've had breakouts. They are not great.

name: Beauty Enthusiast
review:
I tried it on both bare as well as on lightly moisturized skin, still it flaked when I tried to add one more layer for extra coverage. This has already got poor coverage, I should say.

I can't return the product since I kept on trying it in many ways & it's almost a year now. So just to use it & in the best possible way, I mix it up with my foundation sometimes.
Maybe I'll throw it away soon, it doesn't carry an expiry date, but who knows!

name: NicB
review: I really liked the feel of this BB cream, it spreads & blends well. The only down side is the lighting in store was off and it is too dark for me in real lighting:( That was a bummer since I took the time to compare products and then still have to mix it with something else. Other than that, it is a great product for the price.

name: kristie
review: make sure to blend well

name: Allie
review: I tried this BB cream out because it was on sale and was pleased with the product for the price I paid. It was nothing too special but also, nothing was wrong with it, which is much better than most cheap BB creams for me! I don't think that it lasted too long, and I always applied sunscreen underneath, but it had a good amount of coverage especially for the summer months! I will probably buy this again.

name: The Budget shopper
review: This bb cream is amazing for summer it is my favorite bb cream I have found over the years and that it has lighter coverage than regular foundation but it's nice because is great for summer because you don't want your face plastered with make up in the sun. It has the most natural finish and you don't need a lot of it to cover. I like to put a primer on first and then rub this bb cream on and set it with a fluffy powder. The powder really does help if you need more coverage. But if you don't need more coverage a translucent powder would work great or you don't even have to wear a powder at all, but I'm the type of person who likes a little powder on so it's not so dewy.

name: T
review: Immediately left skin feeling oily and super shiny had to add great amount of powder to get rid of shine just needing mote 10 minutes later. Returned product

name: Barb
review: Love how light this is....great for older skin. Doesn't settle into pores or face lines. Very fresh and light look. I did use Revlons primer first, then foundation, translucent powder. Lasts well. Very happy.

name: Ella
review: Great value

name: Kaeza
review: IF YOU ARE OILY AT ALL, YOU WILL HATE THIS!! That being said, if you have dry skin, this is bearable. I love that this product is moisturizing... it doesn't cling to my dry patches, but it is also very blotchy! Also, it never sets; hours later I can touch my face and the product will come off onto my fingers! I really wanted to like this product, but the shade just doesn't fit me... I am nc35 and the shade medium just looks ORANGE on me! I have to use a lot and blend it down to my chest and shoulders to make it work... I will finish this because i hate wasting product, but I will not repurchase!

name: Dee
review: It's soft and easy and doesn't rub off, I'm glad I found it.

name: pippa-bee
review:
This product has decent coverage and is relatively lightweight... but if you plan to wear it and you have normal-combination skin, like myself, carry blotting papers or powder all day!

I used to use Stila Tinted Moisturizer and decided to try something more budget friendly. Revlon BB Cream was recommended and I like the brand, so I went with it. My skin had been so oily by mid day since I started using it. To test if it was the makeup and not some other factor, I bought the Stila tinted moisturizer and used that for a few days. No problems with oily skin those days. Used Revlon again today and my skin is so greasy by lunch.

Can't use it. This is a deal breaker.

name: carik1
review: Use it daily.

name: Coastal Chick
review: I used this as a foundation.  It camouflages wrinkles very well without being heavy.

name: Nice
review: A decent BB cream, good coverage,lasting power, best spf on the market for a DS product good overall.Just a bit difficult to apply, a little dense.

name: The Beautiful Grad
review: I like this product because for me it works as a foundation. If you like a subtle touch of smoothness on your face and not even medium coverage, then this is for you. It is very easy to put on, and blends like a dream. It's extremely lightweight. However, on my skin, it does add shine, which I need to matt with powder. It also makes my face a little oily, but since I have dry skin, I like it.

name: vanessa
review: I love this bb cream (: for my dry skin but not everybody has dry skin. If you do I recommend this! It hydrates your skin so much! I wear it everyday! :D

name: tammynado
review: I use this daily after my moisturizer and before my foundation - it's not too heavy or thick.  It's corrects color issues and helps me get a flawless looking face when all of my make up is on.  I also just use this by itself if I don't want to put the full make up on - if I am working out or going to be out in the sun.  I Love it!

name: Aeliz
review:
I used this product twice. Both times, it made me break out in super-dry, peeling skin that burned in my T-zone. It was horrible. I literally had to carry around a bottle of lotion and reapply every half an hour or else I could hardly blink my eyes my skin dried out so bad.
I don't know if this was just me, or what. I do have sensitive skin. It's a pity, because it did have good coverage for a BB cream and it would've been something I would use every day if it wasn't super drying.

name: Lol
review: My go to Bb cream! I've tried others like Maybelline and Loreal and I must say they are nothing compared to this Revlon one!

name: thechadness04
review: A little oily, but enough coverage to where you don't need any extra foundation. Powder is needed unless you like to go for a shiny look. Pretty decent product, good price for what it is. SPF is an added bonus.

name: Freckles
review: We went camping and I needed a good light Makeup for my freckle face. I love the fact that this Makeup is lightweight and has a SPF 35 simply perfect!

name: Former Fed
review: Like the light coverage and the sunscreen.  Does not cause my skin to break out.  Looks and feels good.

name: Later
review: I used Bobbie Brown tinted moisturizer for years and think this is just as good and certainly cheaper. I am over 60 & want light coverage.

name: Kelly
review: I was looking for a primer and decided to try this one. However, it has enough color that I didn't feel like I needed more coverage on top of it! Perfect for hot summer days where you want minimal makeup! It's got a slight dewy finish that can look a lil oily mid day but a powder touch up fixes that fine. I will def be buying this again!

name: tammynado
review: I like this product - I it under my foundation and it helps even out my skin tone and keep my feeling hydrated and not dry.  The only negative thing is I would like to use it alone and not have to wear foundation for a day but it's a very sheer coverage and doesn't seem to last long enough for me if I try to use it that way.  But works great under foundation!

name: Mrs. F
review: I was hoping this would work for me because of all of the good things I heard about it. Unfortunately, even though it's "sheer" it made my skin look pasty. Definitely not good for darker tones. It was easy to apply but because of how white my skin look I can't even remember how it was for coverage.

name: beauty12
review: very oily and itchy - try other products than this one!

name: Bonnie
review: This is the perfect first layer for a mineral application.

name: grandma
review: Good coverage without heaviness.

name: and05
review:
This BB cream was absolutely awful. Clogged pores, wore off in about 1 hour, caused breakouts. The only good thing I can say is the color was a perfect match for my skin.

I guess you get what you pay for. I returned the product and got a tinted moisturizer instead, which works way better.

name: mandee86
review: Does make my face a little oily towards the end of the day, but good product for someone on a budget.

name: Kelly
review: Was very greasy . . . would not reccomend it for oily skin, or even oily/ combo skin. It felt heavy on the skin, and didnt even last that long even with a primer. Has a oily look on the skin, that even with caking on powder ( i tried Revlon Nearly Naked, Bare Mineals Matte, Bare Mineral Touch Up Veil, & Laura Geller) did even look dewy.

name: Kiwi The Great
review: I bought this to wear under the Revlon Photoready Airbrush foundation and I really like the two together. This bb cream also works well on its own in a pinch, but it won't cover redness. It does flake up if you rub it too much and can get a little greasy, but no worse than any other bb cream I've tried (loreal, maybelline).

name: Elena
review: I don't think I've ever been so disappointed in a tinted moisturizer.  I think we all know that the american bb creams are just tinted moisturizers...not even glorified tinted moisturizers at that.  Anyway, this bb cream covers nothing.  The only thing this product has going for it is the SPF 30.  It's not flattering for oily skin either.

name: Bookworm
review: I use it daily because its light, goes on smoothly and gives me a lovely skin tone.

name: Beauty over time
review: I had a coupon to try this brand, and so I've tried it for 3 days in a row. It really makes the morning routine very effeicent. I would recommend it. I hope I will be able to find the color again,I had been using a competior and could never find the color again. At night I do wash it off, not recommend to sleep.

name: MONICARRHH
review: don't put around the eyes its burns as heck! but its good coverage

name: soccer mom
review: First time using this product, I love it. :)

name: AbbyNormalTN
review: I have really dry skin and I hate taking time to get really made up every day so this product is a real hit with me!

name: BB Cream Fan
review: I use this product as part of my daily routine.  It only takes a small amount and works fantastically.  I don't get the normal shine or makeup creases as with other facial creams.  I was concerned about spending the money before I knew how it would work.  I am totally satisfied and will purchase again.

name: Micky
review: I really like this unique product because it is multi-purpose.  I put it on over my moisturizer and then apply my foundation where needed.  I'm finding that I don't need to use as much foundation and this product is definitely less expensive than my Lancome foundation.  The bonus is that it has 30 spf sunscreen but doesn't feel like traditional sunscreen on my face. I also like it for the weekend when I am out exercising and don't feel like putting on a whole face full of foundation. This adds a little color, coverage and protects my face from the sun.  So happy I found it!

name: Been around the makeup counter!
review: I apply this with a sponge & it goes on really well.  I've used brushes & my fingers but sponges are quick & blend really well.  I love that I don't have to apply my foundation primer & my oil control primer but I can if I want & it doesn't feel greasy or overdone.  I don't really have anything negative to say about this product.  I do have pretty bad acne but this product does NOT break me out.  It also makes my skin appear brighter & gives me that cheesy youthful glow.  I say give it a try!

name: Ryanitis
review: Did not like

name: JMo
review: I can't say that this product was bad, but I also can't say that it was super great. I just didn't love it. I'm not sure what I was expecting but to me it just felt like a tinted moisturizer rather than a BB cream.

name: CeeBeauty
review:
The only down fall with this product is that by mid day your face will def be on the oily side, even during winter season. I found that using a matte powder helps or just blotting your face with a napkin. The coverage is sheer, if you need to conceal any redness, add concealer on top of it..A powder to finish is definitly needed!
OVERALL- good, on the go- just make sure to check mid-day for shiny face.

name: Skarleth B
review: I have always been a fan of BB creams,  in fact,  it was my first form of foundation I used back when I started wearing make up.  I always bought Almay but decided to give my favorite brand,  Revlon,  a try.  I absolutely hate the way this BB creams smells! It is such a potent scent- the product is actually very oily too,  probably more for dry skin rather than oily/combination.  I've found good use for it when I want to skip a primer and use the BB cream as one,  but I wouldn't buy this again,  simply because the scent and oiliness of it doesn't agree with my skin.

name: MCG
review: Good coverage with sun protection.  Would prefer a more matte finish, but given how difficult it is to find a BB cream that matches my very fair skin, I'm very happy with the product.

name: Susan ❤
review:
Makeup my face look flawless
Love it because it has SPF 30 so my skin is getting protection too ❤

name: K
review: It's a great buy

name: Peanuty Mermaid
review: My only complaint is that it doesn't stay on all day.

name: barb
review: Good product...reasonable price better than the greasy expensive BOOM makeup I tried!

name: Hannah
review: This product works well in small time increments but it does not stay on all day. I find myself reapplying it every 5 hours. Besides that, great pigmentation and coverage for a BB cream! Great for the summer time

name: MB
review: Daily makeup routine.

name: Sarah Jo
review: For everyday looks and evening!

name: La Gioconda
review: This holds its own against much pricier products from Armani, Bobbi Brown, and YSL.  I know because I own and use all these others.  It's sheer, but gives a soft glow while evening out skin imperfections and discolorations.  At this price, I have several that I keep at work, at home and in my gym locker for touch ups.

name: Amy
review: I thought I'd give this a try since it was 40% off but honestly, I still wanted to return it. This applies easily but there is barely any coverage and leaves a greasy look.

name: Jenn8779
review: The Light shade was a great match for my uber pale skin.  The product goes on nicely, is smooth and has a higher SPF (30).  My one main issue is that it either doesn't have the coverage of BB's I've tried or it doesn't last on the skin.  I'm still on the fence with it but will try setting it with powder to see if that lasts longer.  All in all, not bad for a lower end BB cream and no irritation

name: Justamom
review: On the quest for the perfect BB cream with good SPF coverage.  This one was too thick, didn't seem to last all day. Matched my skin tone but not what I'm looking for.

name: Jem
review: I love how this goes on, however, it gave me a horrible orange color and was rather streaky. As far as drug store brands go, I much prefer the l'Oreal BB cream.

name: makeuplove
review: The must have for me Barely got it and works good so far so   so far happy with this product

name: VintChic
review: I love Revlon and have used other Photo-Ready products.  This BB cream just does not have enough coverage for me.  Applying more made it look chalky and it has too much Titanim Dioxide for me.

name: K
review: Does not provide any coverage and feels a bit sticky when applying. Not what I was looking for in a BB cream.

name: Amber Gibbs
review: This is a decent sunscreen but its not quite as good as the loreal magic bb cream

name: Jo Jo
review: Very easy to use.  Especially for someone on the go as much as I am

name: History Teacher
review: I have used other BBs, but this one seems to do a better job, especially when used in conjunction with the Photoready Foundation.

name: full of beauty
review: I put this on right after I wash my face, and I'm not oily. It does seem to lighten a bit, but the key is to get one shade darker and don't pile it on. The coverage is great without using alot. My skin looks naturally smooth and even toned.

name: Annie
review: This product does not really seem to do much. It does not cover dark areas very well but  just leaves the area feeling very greasy. It is rather unfortunate, since I love many other Revlon products!

name: Meme
review: This is just so so I returned it

name: caroline
review: did not work for me at all. It was greasy and had no coverage at all.

name: Christina
review: When I got it I thought it would be so good, which it is but I have combination skin and it made me really shiny. Its great just makes me shiny even after I put powder over it :)

name: Jeni
review: I returned this because it whited me out completely and then turned super oily

name: Matt's Bride
review: Easy to apply and looks very natural. Happy with this product!

name: Morga
review: This is a great product. I am very happy with it.

name: Iwanttogotosurvivor
review: Really greasy feel, coverage not great, more of a lightly tinted moisturizer

name: Folly
review: This is a good product. Blends well with natural skin color.

name: Sin
review: Easy to use.  Looks good

name: Anonymous
review: I got this for band camp because I knew I would be out in the sun for a while. I was impressed. It had nice coverage for a BB cream and protected me well from the sun. I wouldn't wear this without primer but it was very good overall.

name: D star
review: Awesome product

name: mgriffin24
review: this was very VERY thick and extremely unblendable. I am not very picky at all with the products I use, but this was very patchy and hard to use

name: Amanda
review: I've been looking for a good BB cream for a while now since I don't need that much coverage. I have very oily skin so maybe that's why I didn't like it but even right when I put it on it felt so oily. It made my pores look huge and just made me feel disgusting. I gave it two stars because although I did like the coverage, it didn't work for my oily skin.

name: Nikki
review: I didn't like this product, I used similar products like this one, but this one was way to heavy and greasy for my liking.

name: Chloe
review: This made my face so oily. There is only 3 shades to pick from and it provides no coverage. Not worth the money.

name: Bear lover
review:
Use as a cover up for warm days so I don't have to use a base foundation
This & powder with blush for office
Then use with foundation for date night

name: KB
review: After using about half the tube or less, I found that I was getting nothing but oil!! No one said SHAKE WELL. It has separated. I loved the creamy make-up when I was on that part of the tube, but now I only have oily mess.

name: Tay
review: Covers well.

name: Anna
review: Love the consistancy and love the matt and neutral coverage. I have pretty nice skin and this bb cream covered up some of my acne but not all of it. It Is very buildable, very easily blended, creates a matt/neutral finish and the best coverage to me out of all the drugstore bb creams. With concealer and the revelon bb cream my skin looks flawless!

name: Anna
review: Love the consistancy and love the matt and neutral coverage. I have pretty nice skin and this bb cream covered up some of my acne but not all of it. It Is very buildable, very easily blended, creates a matt/neutral finish and the best coverage to me out of all the drugstore bb creams. With concealer and the revelon bb cream my skin looks flawless!

name: Anna
review: Love the consistancy and love the matt and neutral coverage. I have pretty nice skin and this bb cream covered up some of my acne but not all of it. It Is very buildable, very easily blended, creates a matt/neutral finish and the best coverage to me out of all the drugstore bb creams. With concealer and the revelon bb cream my skin looks flawless!

name: Angie
review: I am a big fan of Revlon cosmetics and BB creams.  I was excited to try out this product, but unfortunately it didn't perform as I expected.  The coverage was comparable to other BB creams and it blended well with my concealer.  My skin is combination and this product left my skin feeling oily/greasy.  My skin produced a shine throughout the day on my chin and nose which doesn't happen with other BB creams I have tried.  This product may be better for dry skins.

name: Hannah458
review: I use this product as a foundation. Just because it is summer and it's hot, the makeup doesn't feel heavy.

name: Ronnie
review: Though I loved the way this is making my skin look and feel, I appear to be having some kind of allergic reaction to it.

name: dawnmarie
review: This is my 2nd attempt at buying a BB cream.  (Also tried Too Faced.)  Both are ok, but I just don't see that they give me much coverage.  I prefer to use a primer w/a concealer, as I don't have the best skin...  If you don't need much coverage, you might like BB creams.

name: Country Girl
review: The product is very light, goes on smoothly, but does not provide the coverage I expected. Photoready and skin perfecter it is not.  I needed to layer with my regular foundation to add the coverage I need, so I can't use it as a make up.  I am fair complexioned, but perhaps the "Light pale" is too light.  I will try a different product next time.

name: sherbear
review: It was not a good bb cream it didnt work at all for me!

name: Marian
review: This BB cream gives excellent coverage, blends easily and looks very natural.  Many BB creams give very little coverage like a tinted moisturizer but this one is falls somewhere between a tinted moisturizer and full foundation but makes you look like you have really great skin.  For the money this is one of the best BB creams I have found.  The SPF 30 is an added bonus.
